EmailTemplate.name: Site Visit Attachments Rejected
EmailTemplate.subject: Site Visit Attachments Rejected
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!SiteVisit__r.Award__c.GranteePOC__c},
Your documents have been approved for Site Visit {!SiteVisit__c.SiteVisitName__c}. Your site visit will proceed as planned on the scheduled day.
Please do not reply to this email. You may contact the GovGrants Support Team at govgrants@support.com, or your Grant Administrator if you have any questions.
Sincerely,
EGMS Team
